subject: Order question
description_text:
Hello, 

My order number is  SSN5146 and was curious when the shifter will be back in stock and shipping. Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Brandon Patsos,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.Â
